articles.author: Andy Yang
articles.title: NASA 拖沓已久的 James Web 太空望远镜终于组装完成了
articles.description:
NASA 的新一代旗舰级 James Webb 望远镜，因为复杂的构造与工程上的难题，使得发射时间持续延宕，由原定的 2018 年发射一直拖到了现在才完成组装，而发射则是恐怕要等到 2021 年了。

这背后主要的原因，是因为 James Webb 不是像哈勃一样，以可见光为主要的观测范围，而是移到了红外线频段。这意味着它必需要安装一套由五片大型金箔组成的「光盾」，来阻挡来自太阳的红外线，并保持内部组件的低温。这五片金箔的收纳与展开造成了许多头疼的难题，但还好科学家已经解决了大部份的困难，将其与火箭推进部组装在了…
articles.content:
NASA James Webb 2018 2021 
James Webb 
2021

articles.title: NASA 拖沓已久的 James Web 太空望遠鏡終於組裝完成了
articles.description:
NASA 的新一代旗艦級 James Webb 望遠鏡，因為複雜的構造與工程上的難題，使得發射時間持續延宕，由原定的 2018 年發射一直拖到了現在才完成組裝，而發射則是恐怕要等到 2021 年了。

這背後主要的原因，是因為 James Webb 不是像哈伯一樣，以可見光為主要的觀測範圍，而是移到了紅外線頻段。這意味著它必需要安裝一套由五片大型金箔組成的「光盾」，來阻擋來自太陽的紅外線，並保持內部組件的低溫。這五片金箔的收納與展開造成了許多頭疼的難題，但還好科學家已經解決了大部份的困難，將其與火箭推進部組裝在了…

articles.author: 山根博士 (Yasuhiro Yamane)
articles.title: ファーウェイ「Harmony OS」採用のソーシャルスマホが誕生するのか：山根博士のスマホよもやま話
articles.description:
米中貿易摩擦の影響によりネットワーク製品だけではなくスマートフォンの開発にも大きな支障を受けたファーウェイが、自社開発OSとしてHarmony OSを発表しました。

articles.content: Yet, with great convenience typically comes great security issues. The magnetic strip on the back of credit debit cards opened up an exciting opportunity for criminals. Using devices known as "skimmers," tech thieves could steal data from a card (the number a… [+9129 chars]

articles.author: Christine Fisher
articles.title: Juul will require retailers to scan IDs before selling its vapes
articles.description: By May 2021, anyone looking to purchase a Juul e-cig will have to have their ID scanned. Juul announced today that it will soon require all retailers to use an updated point-of-sale (POS) system. When Juul products are scanned, the POS will prompt th...
articles.content: These new Retail Access Control Standards (RACS) are Juul's latest attempt to curb teen vaping. More than 50 retail chains -- a total of more than 40,000 outlets -- have agreed to comply. Juul will stop distributing products to retailers who aren't RACS-certi… [+1206 chars]

articles.author: Marc DeAngelis
articles.title: Plex will stream free, ad-supported Warner Bros. movies and TV shows
articles.description: While Plex mainly focuses on allowing users to set up a streaming server for their own media files, the company has also ventured into other features such as live TV, podcasts and integration with other streaming services. Their latest move will add...
articles.content: Streaming exclusively to US users, Plex will roll out the content later this year. There's no programming line-up yet, so we don't know if users will be treated to current movies and TV, Warner's collection of classics, or some combination of the two. One det… [+485 chars]

articles.title: Can this year's new Kindle compete with the Paperwhite?
